description: Minimalist Git line history tracking tool, focused on precise code line and file history tracing.
welcome.lineHistory:
Show Git modification history for the current line

[Show Line History](command:gitLiner.showLineHistory)

Or right-click in the editor to select the corresponding option.
welcome.fileHistory:
Show Git modification history for the current file

[Show File History](command:gitLiner.showFileHistory)

Or right-click in the editor to select the corresponding option.
config.pageSize.description: Number of commits to load per page
config.showStatusBar.description: Show Git Liner information in status bar
config.autoRefresh.description: Automatically refresh history when switching files
